text: Nan adarasi, kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei. Kɨ ti pura gumazitam o amizitamɨn akam ia mɨkɨnizɨ ia anetegha akar igharazimɨn gɨn zuima, kɨ ti dɨgavir kuram gamighan koghai. Ezɨ gumazamiziba Akar Aghuir kam na ganɨngizir puvatɨ. Egha gumazamiziba akar kam nan sure gamizir puvatɨ. Krais Iesus uabɨ Akar Aghuir kam nan akazɨ kɨ a gɨfo. Kamaghɨn ia foghasa, kɨ ia mɨgei, Akar Aghuir kɨ ia mɨkɨnizim, kar puram akar gumazamizitabar akamɨn otozir puvatɨzim.
